description:
Thank you! The bids for the items on our page for the #ukrainereliefauction totaled $965! Plus, several winners have added to their donations bringing the total to $1315! This is being donated directly to vital organizations like @doctorswithoutborders @refugees 
@icrc 

We are so grateful for the opportunity to participate in such a widespread effort to help the Ukrainian refugee crisis. 

We remain aware that families around the world are in urgent need of aid, as refugees and in their homes. In that light, our family has decided to also make a matching donation of $1315 to Action Against Hunger. Some of the wonderful work they do is on the ground in Afghanistan getting nutrition and health services directly to families. Please take a moment to read more here:

https://www.actionagainsthunger.org/story/afghanistan-voices-mothers

#love #smallbusiness #ifyoucan #donate #donation #family #gratitude
